titles.title: Don't Tax Our Fallen Public Safety Heroes Act
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude certain compensation received by public safety officers and their dependents from gross income.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary:
1/28/2015--Introduced. Don't Tax Our Fallen Public Safety Heroes Act
Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income, for income tax purposes, federal public safety officer death benefits or amounts paid under a state program to surviving dependents of a public safety officer who died as the direct and proximate result of a personal injury sustained in the line of duty.
